name: find_object
description: find, identify, look for, or search for a described object in a waypoint

name: count_object
description: count the objects of a specific type in a waypoint

name: describe_object
description: describe an object in a waypoint

name: pick_object
description: get, fetch, grasp, pick, or take an object in a waypoint

name: place_object
description: place, or put an object in a waypoint

name: offer_object
description: deliver, offer, or bring an object to a person in a waypoint

name: find_person
description: find, identify, look for, or search for a described person in a waypoint

name: describe_person
description: describe a person in a waypoint

name: follow_person
description: walk behind a person from a waypoint to another waypoint

name: look_to
description: look to a person in a waypoint

name: guide_person
description: take, escort, lead, or guide a person from a waypoint to another waypoint

name: listen
description: listen to a person in a waypoint

name: speak
description: speak, or tell something to a person in a waypoint

name: move_to
description: move from a waypoint to another waypoint
